text: Sergey Kuzhugetovich Shoigu (Russian: Сергей Кужугетович Шойгу, Tuvan: Сергей Күжүгет оглу Шойгу; born 21 May 1955) is a Russian politician who has served as a Minister of Defense of Russia from 6 November 2012. == Other websites == * UznayVse Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Ministers of Defence of Russia Category:Tuva
title: Sergei Shoigu
